content.question: The phrase structure of this example can best be described as

choices.label: a four-measure phrase followed by a twelve-measure phrase
a six-measure phrase followed by a ten-measure phrase
an eight-measure phrase followed by an eight-measure phrase
a twelve-measure phrase followed by a four-measure phrase

content.answer: an eight-measure phrase followed by an eight-measure phrase

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

skill.text: Skill 2.F: Use terms and symbols to describe formal features and relationships in notated music, including motives, phrases, and phrase relationships.
